successes.title: Kings of War Fantasy Battle Game - 2nd Edition
successes.description: Kings of War is the 2-player fantasy miniatures game where epic armies clash on tabletop!

Pledges.description: THANK YOU FOR BACKING! This reward level is perfect if you just want to pledge for add-ons and not the whole game. Pledges under $50 must add $5 for shipping to UK and US. Pledges of $50 or more include free shipping to UK and US. Please see main page for international shipping.

Get the Kings of War 2nd Edition Hardback Rulebook, 2nd Edition Kings of War soft cover Core Rulebook PLUS any applicable Stretch Goals! Includes FREE UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.
Get a new Kings of War army - choose from either 2 Starter Armies or 1 Mega-starter Army. See main graphic for details.
Also get the Kings of War 2nd Edition Hardback Rulebook, 2nd Edition Kings of War soft cover Gamer's Rulebook PLUS any applicable Stretch Goals!
Includes FREE UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.
Get a new Kings of War army - choose from either 2 Starter Armies or 1 Mega-starter Army. See main graphic for details.
Also get the Kings of War 2nd Edition Hardback Rulebook, 2nd Edition Kings of War softcover Gamer's Rulebook PLUS any applicable Stretch Goals!
Includes FREE UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.
